nodes.bodyText:
here and below, I prefer not to cd anywhere if we don't have to:
tar -czf /tmp/pxf-build-dependencies.tar.gz -C /tmp/output . &&
tar -czf /tmp/pxf-automation-dependencies.tar.gz -C /tmp/automation .
Makes the script less error prone, and you don't have to remember to cd back before deleting the directory.
